name: The Defragmentor
description: Feel like there is too much going on? Can't tell left from right and up from down? If so, then you can organize your mind with a trip to John Solomon's Defragmentor. Unlike almost all others, this game is not meant to waste your time. The fullness of the game can be had in only 25 to 45 minutes, so set aside an hour and take the journey.
